code: const FakeStoreApi={fetchAllProducts:async()=>{const res=await fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products');const result=res.json();return result;},fetchProductById:async productId=>{const res=await fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products/".concat(productId));const result=await res.json();return result;},fetchProductsBySearchQuery:async query=>{const res=await fetch("https://fakestoreapi.com/products");const result=await res.json();return result.filter(product=>product.title.toLowerCase().includes(query));}};export{FakeStoreApi};
